headline: Mastercard Taps Crypto Spending With MetaMask Card And Valuation Upside
summary: Mastercard and MetaMask have launched a self-custody crypto debit card across nearly all US states, including New York. The card lets users spend crypto via Mastercard's existing payment network at merchants that already accept Mastercard. The rollout is supported by a dedicated rewards program tied to crypto spending. For Mastercard (NYSE:MA), this move ties a core payments franchise directly to on chain wallets, giving crypto users a way to tap the existing card rails without giving up...
